revised_title: Inverse Problem for Vibrating Beams in Free-Clamped Configuration: A Review
tldr: The article discusses the inverse problem for vibrating beams in the free-clamped configuration. The author reconstructs the flexural rigidity and density functions of the beam from data associated with natural frequencies of vibration. The study focuses on the unique non-singular beam without a back and presents a method to construct the beam using auxiliary equations and fundamental solutions.
